mapper.insert: insert into ecs_virtual_goods_district (district_id, region_id, district_name, province, city, county, sort, is_show) values (#{districtId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{city,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{county,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShow,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update ecs_virtual_goods_district set region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_name = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, city = #{city,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, county = #{county,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_show = #{isShow,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select district_id, region_id, district_name, province, city, county, sort, is_show from ecs_virtual_goods_district
